definitions.title: vb. denom. Hiph.
definitions.body: take the left (alw. opp. [[הֵמִין]]):—Impf. cohort. [[אַשְׂמְאִ֫ילָה]] Ge 13:9; 2 mpl, [[תַּשְׂמְאִ֫ילוּ]] Is 30:21; Imv. fs. [[הַשְׂמִילִי]] (Ges:§ 23 f Kö:1. 276) Ez Eze 21:21, cf. Inf. cstr. [[הַשְׂמִיל]] 2Sa 14:19; Pt. [[מַשְׂמִאלִים]] 1Ch 12:2;—
= go to the left Ge 13:9 (J), Ez Eze 21:21.
fig. turn (aside) to the left (fr. true way) 2Sa 14:19, Is 30:21.
